publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3423.2 Mr Kenneth Gibson: Race Equality-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3423) in the name of Ms Margaret Curran, insert at end "and recognises the importance of fully resourcing these bodies in order to sustain their efforts over the long term." Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Tricia Marwick*, Shona Robison*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
